trans-unit.source: Provides the services for management of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i servizi per la gestione degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> provides methods that you can use to manage the workflow queues associated with a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> fornisce i metodi che è possibile utilizzare per gestire le code del flusso di lavoro associate a un'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `CreateQueue`, that initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> object by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato un metodo, denominato `CreateQueue`, che inizializza un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> chiamando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The code then uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> with a specified name exists.
trans-unit.target: Il codice quindi utilizza il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> per determinare se esiste una classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> con un nome specificato.

trans-unit.source: If it does not exist, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method; if it does the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se non esiste, il codice chiama il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A>, altrimenti chiama il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte dell'esempio SDK File Watcher Activity nel file FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [attività controllo del File System](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).

trans-unit.source: The name of the queue.
trans-unit.target: Nome della coda.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> is visible outside the scope of the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che specifica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> è visibile all'esterno dell'ambito della transazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> by using the specified name and transactional scope.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> utilizzando il nome e l'ambito transazionale specificati.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> is created with the specified `queueName`.
trans-unit.target: Viene creato un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> con il valore `queueName` specificato.

trans-unit.source: If transactional is `true`, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> is only visible inside the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: Se l'ambito transazionale è `true`, l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> è visibile solo all'interno della transazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `CreateQueue`, that initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> object by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato un metodo, denominato `CreateQueue`, che inizializza un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> chiamando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The code then uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> with a specified name exists.
trans-unit.target: Il codice quindi utilizza il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> per determinare se esiste una classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> con un nome specificato.

trans-unit.source: If it does not exist, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method; if it does the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se non esiste, il codice chiama il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A>, altrimenti chiama il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte dell'esempio SDK File Watcher Activity nel file FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [attività controllo del File System](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="queueName" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="queueName" /> è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> with the name specified by <paramref name="queueName" /> already exists.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> con il nome specificato da <paramref name="queueName" /> esiste già.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> to delete.
trans-unit.target: Nome dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> da eliminare.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Elimina l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method that writes a string to the console, creates an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente è illustrato un metodo che scrive una stringa nella console e crea un'istanza di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> chiamando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.DeleteWorkflowQueue%2A> method to delete the queue associated with a `QueueName` property on the current workflow.
trans-unit.target: Infine, il codice chiama il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.DeleteWorkflowQueue%2A> per eliminare la coda associata a una proprietà `QueueName` sul flusso di lavoro corrente.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte dell'esempio SDK File Watcher Activity nel file FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="queueName" /> è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Nome di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: Tests for the existence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Verifica l'esistenza dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> exists; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> esiste; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `CreateQueue`, that initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> object by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.

trans-unit.source: The code then uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> with a specified name exists.

trans-unit.source: If it does not exist, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method; if it does the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se non esiste, il codice chiama il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A>, altrimenti chiama il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `CreateQueue`, that initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> object by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato un metodo, denominato `CreateQueue`, che inizializza un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> chiamando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The code then uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> with a specified name exists.
trans-unit.target: Il codice quindi utilizza il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> per determinare se esiste una classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> con un nome specificato.

trans-unit.source: If it does not exist, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method; if it does the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se non esiste, il codice chiama il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A>, altrimenti chiama il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="queueName" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="queueName" /> è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> specificato non è stato trovato.

trans-unit.source: Contains the unconsumed items in the workflow queues associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService" />.
trans-unit.target: Contiene gli elementi non utilizzati nelle code del flusso di lavoro associate a questo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService" />.

trans-unit.source: When a workflow instance completes or terminates all of the unconsumed items in its workflow queues that are associated with this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> are moved to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.PendingMessagesProperty>.
trans-unit.target: Quando un'istanza del flusso di lavoro completa o termina tutti gli elementi non utilizzati nelle code del flusso di lavoro associate a questo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService>, tali elementi vengono trasferiti a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.PendingMessagesProperty>.
